column4: can anyone help me set up ssh for secure vnc? i tried once before and i couldnt get anything to work
and there is no setup involved
Oh and just for your information: -C turns on compression (which is also very usefull with scp)
so then what is all this stuff i iread about needing putty and stuff, setting up keys etc
um... putty is for Windows right?
everything is more difficult in windows :P
But you might want to set up public/private keys, but that is just for convenience, you won't have to enter your password anymore
how do i do that, and does this work if i want to vnc in from windwos to a linux machine with ssh
Sorry, I can't help you with Windows
I got Putty running with Wine! Try this:
open a new connection with putty, but before connecting, go to connection->SSH->tunnels
i need to resetup ssh though
ive unistalled everything, and like i said i would like froms cratch, and hopefully setup everything up right
um... so you have no server to connect to?
ok, so install SSH on the linux server first
